elements.text: PART ONE
SCENE 1: EXT. MATHEW STREET
(FX: A CROWD GATHERED AT A RALLY B/G, CHEERS BUILD THROUGH
FOLLOWING)

(OVER CROWD) We’re coming to you live from the centre of Liverpool. Alongside the platform and speakers that appeared overnight in Mathew Street. Already a flashmob of several hundred has gathered for what they’re calling ‘Rufus Stone Day’. People keep arriving, and we’ve seen local bands, acrobats and fire-eaters. No sign of the man himself as yet...

We don’t know exactly what to expect, but online rumours and word-of-mouth suggest that after the entertainment here, there’1ll be a parade through the streets to the dance-stage and sound system that’s being set up right now in the park. Rufus Stone has said... well, he’s said this is the last day. Stone is the media sensation that came from nowhere. Famous for being famous, after his triumph on reality TV last year, he’s been touring cities across the North-West with his own brand of cod- philosophy. Are your nightmares predicting the end of the world? Rufus Stone seems to think so, and he’s promised he’11l reveal all later today.
FX: CROWD CHANTING ‘RUFUS, RUFUS, RUFUS’ BUILDS TO HUGE CHEER
(VIA PA IN B/G) (WHOOPS) Yeah!

(OVER NOISE) That’s him, taking the stage now. Church leaders have objected, saying he’s stealing from every organised religion to suit himself. Stirring things up. But he’s certainly drawn a crowd. Not surprising perhaps, when a free festival springs up wherever he goes. Let’s see what he has to say-
(FX: A CROWD GATHERED AT A RALLY, FALLS QUIET AS RUFUS PREPARES TO SPEAK)

(VIA PA) (WHOOPS. SHUSHES CROWD, THEN SERIOUS) And in the end days, there will be dreams and visions. I know you’ve had ‘em. We all have. It’s not written down anywhere. You won’t find any of this in your New Testaments or Old. Your Qurans or your Torah. I’m talking about the here and now. The days we live in.
(SUDDENLY LIVELY) And today we’re gonna partyyyy! Woo-hoo!
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 2
FX: CROWD CHEERS
(VIA PA) I know what they’re saying on the telly. Rufus Stone is just some numpty. Just another loon predicting the end of the world. Well, look out, ‘Look North’. You’re wrong.
I’ve been right across this green and pleasant land. I’ve listened to England’s beating heart. I’m not talking about the cesspits down south. That’s England’s belly and its bowels.
FX: CROWD REACTION, LAUGHTER, CHEERS

(VIA PA) You know what I’m talking about. I’m talking about the North. Some of you lot have been with me from the start. Followed me from Sheffield to Manchester. Bolton to Leeds and back again. I’ve no favourites. You’re all welcome. And I’m gonna do my best to save you all.
FX: CHEERS, BAND TUNES UP BEHIND
Today’s gonna be a blinder. Today’s gonna be a day of signs and wonders. But first. Let’s have the sounds and dancing. I give
you ‘The End of Days’. Take it away boys and girls.
FX: BIG ROCK SOUND —‘MUSE’-LIKE - BEGINS PLAYING
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 3
SCENE 2: INT. CHURCH, NAVE
FX: SCRAPING OF JANET TAKING RUBBINGS OF CARVINGS
(HALF SINGING, HALF HUMMING TO SELF, FOLK SONG ‘THE LEAVING OF LIVERPOOL’ (PUBLIC DOMAIN) )
Farewell to Prince's Landing Stage
River Mersey, fare thee well
I am bound for- (BREAKS OFF)
FX: SCRAPING STOPS
(TO SELF) Ah, look at you hiding there. Almost missed you.
FX: JANET SHIFTS POSITION, SCRAPING AGAIN
HUMS TUNE AGAIN, SINGS LAST LINES TO SELF
It's not the leaving of Liverpool that grieves me But my darling when I think of thee.
FX: CHURCH DOORS OPEN DURING SONG, ECHOING FOOTSTEPS APPROACH
Thought I’d find you here. (FX: CLOSES CHURCH DOOR)
Hiya. (GETTING UP) You’ve got me sussed. Only agreed to help out at this church so I could do my brass-rubbings.
(WALKING OVER) What are they? Eagles? Shields?
Arrows too. The same symbols carved in Kirklees. Can’t tell if these are meant to be snakes or... something else... Fascinating stuff. (BEAT) How about you, Sally love? All packed up?
Yeah. Ready to hit the road. Stayed longer than I should have anyway.
You and me both. Worked out where you’re going yet?
Not exactly. Got my papers through from my old unit. Had a contact pull some strings to account for my ‘compassionate leave’. Might just sign up with them again. Belong somewhere, you know?
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 4
I know all about belonging, Sally. Dog collar, remember?
Yeah, I suppose being a vicar is like having a squadron. Being part of a club.
And the good Lord gave us lots of clubs to choose from.
Well, even though you’re not in the Catholic squad, I’m glad I met you at St Michael’s. Before the funeral.
That’s why I’m doing this. You don’t think I’m touring every church in the North-West just to sketch medieval carvings?
I did wonder...
It’s just a cover. I’m here to meet people. Help people. Get some perspective.
You’ve helped me these last few weeks. I don’t know what I’d have done without you.
I know. Always hard to say goodbye — it’s not about how long you’ve known them, it’s how close you are. Well. You’ve got St Christopher looking after you now.
What? (TOUCHING NECKLACE) Oh, this. Yeah. It belonged to a friend.
You’ve seen a lot of death, Sally Morgan. Don’t let it make you old before your time. Are you sure soldiering is the right thing?
It’s all I know. (BEAT) Janet.. I had another of those dreams last night.
Go on.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 5
I was lying there. In agony. Like I’d been shot. Right in the guts. Everything around me white. And the pain... I was screaming. I think I woke myself up. Look at my palms. Dug my nails right in.
Ouch.

Everyone’s saying they’re premonitions. About... how they’1l die. They’re seeing earthquakes. Monsters. Loads of people with the same nightmares. Giant black slugs sucking the life out of them. Everyone’s on about it. Rufus Stone was interviewed-
Don’t talk to me about that charlatan.
I thought, it’s just coincidence. You know when you hear an old song then suddenly it’s everywhere. But it’s more than that.
People are worried about bad dreams, love. So they have bad dreams. Probably feeds itself. Everyone has nightmares. Doesn’t mean they’1l1 come true.
(BEAT) Janet. Have you...?
Blackness. That’s all I get. Falling forever and ever. Into darkness. Not very nice. But like I said. It’s a dream.
(FX: HOIKING UP RUCKSACK) Well the world better not end before I catch my train. I’1ll take a last wander round. I’ve grown quite fond of this city. Got a buzz all its own.
The pool of life, they used to call it. Everyone feels at home here. No matter where they’re from. Take care, Sally. If you ever need a friend. Well, you know where I am.
Yeah. I’1ll just look for the nearest brass rubbings. Thanks Janet. For everything. Bye.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 6
SCENE 3: INT. TARDIS, CONSOLE ROOM
(FX: B/G TVM TARDIS AMBIENCE. DOCTOR FIDDLING WITH CONTROLS.
ENTERS )
Has he changed his mind? Our Hector Thomas?
He’1ll come round. It gets a bit much for him. Sometimes he just wants to be left alone.
Perhaps that’s what we should do.
You never wanted him here in the first place, did you?
Ace. We can’t carry on. Some people aren’t cut out for life aboard the TARDIS. Do you think Hector’s enjoying himself? Do you really think he wants to be here? With us? (BEAT) He isn’t Hex.
No. And if we don’t keep trying, he never will be.
Ace. We’ve already done all we can-
(CALLING AT DOORWAY) Youse two arguing again. About me?
No. We were just deciding where to go next.
Come off it. If my ears were burning any more they’d set me hair on fire.
I’1l.. let you two decide on our destination. I’ve left a kettle on somewhere. Several kettles, probably. (FX: GOES OFF)
FX: ACE STARTS SETTING CO-ORDINATES
So where do you fancy? You’ve seen space. The far-off future. Ancient Greece.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 7
Yeah. And that all went well, didn’t it? You know where I wanna
go.
Yeah I know what you said. But now you’ve had a chance to think about it-
(INTERRUPTING) Ace. I wanna go home. Or at least the nearest thing to home I know.
Listen...
Take me back to Liverpool. Twenty-twenties. That’s where I belong.
But I can’t give up-
The Doctor’s right. Some people aren’t cut out for this. I think we worked that out a while ago, you and me.
Hector-
It’s not doing either of us any good. Go and get him to program the satnav, or whatever. I’ve made me decision. Stop the TARDIS, I wanna get off.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 8
SCENE 4: EXT. LIVERPOOL CITY CENTRE, NEAR MATHEW STREET
(FX: CROWDED STREET B/G, MUSIC IN DISTANCE. TAXI PULLS UP,
OPENS DOOR)
(IN CAR) Sorry luv, it’ll take me hours to get through this lot.
(GETTING OUT) I can walk from here. Thanks mate! Keep the change.
(FX: PUTS ON BACKPACK, STARTS WALKING. DISTANT MUSIC ENDS, APPLAUSE)
(WALKING, TO SELF) Sounds like quite a party over there. That’s Scousers for you - any excuse.
(DISTANT OVER P.A.) Those were the End of Days. And my name — if you didn’t know already — is Rufus Stone. Cheers for coming along to my little shindig. Hope you’re all having a good time!
FX: CROWD CHEER IN DISTANCE
(WALKING, TO SELF) The apocalypse guy. Well, we can’t all party like it’s the end of the world. Some of us have places to go.
FX: CROSSES ROAD, WALKING OFF

(DISTANT OVER P.A.) In a bit, we’re all gonna go for a little wander. Down to the park. Take a stroll around this glorious city one more time. So behave yourselves. Keep together, and be polite to the dibbles. ‘Cos when we get there, we’re gonna be ‘avin’ it large!
FX: CROWD CHEER IN DISTANCE
And I’m gonna tell you a story. About why I’m here. Why we’re
all here.
FADE OUT
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 9
SCENE 5: EXT. STREET
FX: BUS PULLS UP, ACE AND HECTOR JUMP OFF AND WALK
Six quid on the bus? The Doctor could’ve parked his crate a bit closer.
You know the TARDIS. Precision landing’s not in its repertoire.
Guess I should get used to using buses again. If I’m staying.
(STOPPING) This is it. Gerrard Street. Number fifty-three isn’t it?
I dunno. I’ve never been.
She brought you up here. It’s your nan’s street.
Not my nan. I don’t remember being here.
If you want to find a home, like you said. Then surely this is the best place to start.
FX: DOOR ACROSS STREET OPENS, NEIGHBOUR PUTTING RUBBISH OUT
Dunno if it’s that easy. I don’t know these people. Maybe we should-
(INTERRUPTING, CALLING) Hey? You from the council?
You what? No, we’re friends of Hilda.
Oh. You haven’t heard then?
We’ve been out of the country.
A long way out of the country.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 10
The old girl passed a month or so back. You’ve missed the funeral I’m afraid. Right old knees-up it was. I mean, I’m not even family, but I didn’t get home till gone midnight-
(OVER NEIGHBOUR) Hilda Schofield... she’s dead?
Right. Not much point us sticking around then- Hang on. (CALLING) What year is this?
What year? Different time zone was it?
Sorry. He gets a bit confused. Did you know Hilda well?
Pleasant old dear. Bit bonkers by all accounts. I only moved in last year, but I’d heard all about that business with her grandson. Very sad.
Oh yeah. When was that?
Couple of years ago now.
Two years? He’s brought us back two years after we were last here?
Still, she had that young lass stopping with her. Nice girl. Sally.
Sally. (REALISES) Morgan. (TO NEIGHBOUR) She still around?

Oh no. Went off to the station this morning. Came to say goodbye. Lovely manners. That’s why I thought you was the council. Quick off the mark before squatters get in. Now don’t you lot go putting any old family in there. None of them London refugees. This is a nice neighbourhood now.
(OVER NEIGHBOUR) Thanks. Come on, Hector.
Thanks. Bye
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 11
FX: ACE AND HECTOR HURRY OFF
(TO SELF) They did warn me, you get all sorts round here...
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 12
SCENE 6: INT. TARDIS, CONSOLE ROOM
FX: TVM TARDIS BEEPS AND HUMS
(TO SELF) Ace... Ace... Ace... Ah well. Who knows? Perhaps Mr Thomas can slot back in where he went missing. Perhaps he can make a new life for himself. A good life.
I hope he’s learned something. That his time with us wasn’t wasted...
FX: SMALL ALERT SOUND
(FX: SWITCHING ALERT OFF) Yes, you were right, old thing. Best not to land exactly where we left off. Give it a wide temporal berth.
FX: MORE ALERTS, DOCTOR USES CONTROLS, INVESTIGATING
Or is that... something else? (BEAT) Oh no.
FX: TARDIS COMPLAINING
Interference with your telepathic circuits. Psychic disturbance... If it can do that to you, what’s it doing to all the people out there...?
How to find out what’s going on..? Listen to local radio.
FX: USES CONTROLS TO TUNE INTO RADIO STATION
(VIA RADIO) You know. I know. Something’s coming. So let’s party like it’s the end of the world!

(VIA RADIO) Rufus Stone there, speaking live at his impromptu festival down in Mathew Street. So far there’s been music, parades and dancing in the street. The crowd’s getting bigger all the time. They’re currently marching along North John Street towards the park. Police say it’s a good-natured carnival atmosphere, and they’re keeping their presence low- key.

Now, the weather. Well, it might be October but we’re still having the warmest autumn on record. Not a cloud in the sky. So get down to Rufus Stone Day while the party’s still going. It might be your last chance after all-
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 13
FX: RADIO SWITCHED OFF
Mathew Street. The Cavern. Eric’s. Carl Jung. And now Mr Rufus Stone. Things get started in Mathew Street. It’s always been the place to be.
FX: OPERATES DOOR CONTROL, WALKS TO HATSTAND
No rain. But I’d best take my brolly. Just in case.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 14
SCENE 7: EXT. STREET
FX: ACE CLIMBING FENCE
You’re mad. I’m not climbing over there into a dead woman’s garden. And I’m definitely not breaking into her house.
(CLIMBING) It’s your house! Come on. Surely it’s worth a try. There might be something in there. Something that’1ll remind you.
Lay off, will you, Ace. I’m not him. Hex got lost when his ‘memory container’ got destroyed. That champagne. There’s nothing left. In that bottle. In me. Anywhere.
Don’t say that. You can’t give up.
It’s gone on long enough. That’s what I am doing. And that’s what you should do an’all. Give up. It’s a lost cause. Stop trying to turn me into something I’m not.
FX: ACE JUMPS DOWN
Hector. You played in that garden. Don’t you feel anything, knowing she’s dead? The woman who looked after you?

She didn’t! She’s just a stranger. All I’ve got is the fake history of some gangster’s life. Even that’s fading away. I’ve got no memories I can rely on. Nothing. I can’t remember where I played as a kid. What my mum was like. Even if I did. I can’t be sure what’s real and what’s been put there.
I’m sick of it. I wanna start building new memories in a normal place. A normal life. I just want to be like everyone else.
But you’re not like everyone else. You’re Hex.

Have you even been listening? I’m not. There’s a hole where Hex should be. And you can’t just stuff it full of your ideas of who he is. Was. You can’t do it, Ace. You can’t turn me into him. (TURNS AWAY)
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 15
(JUMPS DOWN. GRABS HIM) Come here. Hector. Please. (BEAT, GENTLE) Look at me.
(SHRUGGING HER OFF, WALKING AWAY) And you can stop it with a11..
that, too. It doesn’t do any good. You’re only hurting yourself even more.
Hector.
FX: BUS PULLING UP
Leave me alone. There’s the bus. I’m going back into town. And I’m gonna find the Doctor. Say goodbye.
No, listen-
(WALKING AWAY) Stay away from me, Ace. Just. Keep away.
RUNNING
FX: BUS STOPS, OPENS DOORS
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 16
SCENE 8: EXT. LIVERPOOL PARK ENTRANCE
FX: GATHERING CROWD, MUSIC B/G
(VIA PA) Glad you all made it. Seems like a few more have turned up. Can you hear me at the back?
FX: CROWD CHEERS
Now this is more like it. Bit of legroom for a rave. But... you can’t have a rave when the lights are still on, can ya? So whaddya say, I turn ‘em off? (COMMANDING) Let... there... be... dark!
FX: OOHS AND AAHS FROM CROWD
(ARRIVING IN CROWD) I see the weather’s taken a turn for the worse. Total eclipse. How did he manage that, I wonder?
(VIA PA) So now it’s time for the light show! One, two, three!
FX: THUNDER AND LIGHTNING, CROWDS CHEER
Don’t you worry, it’s not gonna rain. Not today of all days. I’m bringing you something brilliant. Something amazing.
Are you indeed?
(VIA PA) Some of you’ve been with me since the start. A lot of you joined after the miracle of Wigan. And I don’t mean them staying up in the Premier League.
(PUSHING THROUGH THE CROWD) Excuse me.. Thank you... Room for a little one? Can I just...
(VIA PA) No. That was turning point. They started to listen. They laughed of course. But they listened too. And now we've come full circle.

That wasn’t just me at Wigan, you know. Feeding all them people. The guys in the wheelchairs. I didn’t do that. You did. Same at Blackpool. People helped each other. We all give strength to each other. And you need to help yourselves now. (CLICKS FINGERS) Apocalyptic enough for ya?
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 17
FX: THUNDER AND LIGHTNING, CROWDS CHEER
(TO SELF) How is he doing that?

Hope you’re all lovin’ it, lovin’ it, lovin it! (QUIETER) Cos, sorry to keep banging on about it. But, you know... end of the world. (BEAT. LOUD AGAIN) You ready to party? DJ, one more tune. Make it immense!
FX: CROWD CHEERS, DANCE MUSIC STARTS
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 18
SCENE 9: EXT. STREET OUTSIDE PARK
FX: DANCE MUSIC IN PARK, OFF. CROWDS DANCING, CHEERING
So many people. No wonder the buses couldn’t get through...
(OFF, IN CROWD) Let me through. Hey mind out. Excuse me. Sorry. (FALLS) Aah!
(RUNNING TO HELP) Hey. Are you all right?
Yes. Just lost my footing. I was trying to squeeze through.
I don’t think they were taking any notice.
No. If you can’t beat ‘em, join ‘em, eh? Thanks. I’m all right now. You get along if you want to go hear what he’s got to say.
What who’s got to say? Who’s everyone come to see? Is Macca doing another farewell gig? Sounds a bit rave-y for hin...
Don’t tell me you’ve not heard of Rufus Stone?
Who’s he? A rock star?
Might as well be. All this fuss. You don’t mind if I take your arm do you... er?
Hector.
Hector. Valiant warrior of Troy.
How do you- (STOPS) Oh yeah. Right.
Janet. Reverend Janet Green. Let’s go and see the circus shall we?
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 19
SCENE 10: INT. TRAIN STATION
FX: B/G PASSERS-BY, MILLING AND WAITING
(FX: PRESSING BUTTONS ON TICKET MACHINE) OK. Let’s try again. Economy... One-way... London...
FX: MACHINE ALARM BEEPS
What do you mean, ‘no service’? It’s up there on the board. Six o'clock tonight.
FX: TANNOY BING-BONG
We regret to announce that due to unforeseen circumstances there are no further departures to London Euston this evening.

Fine. You win. Let’s try... Birmingham. (FX: MORE BUTTONS) They can’t all be cancelled. There must be a train going somewhere... (BEAT) Where’s my charge card gone? (FX: TRIES A FEW MORE BUTTONS) You swallowed it?
(FX: HITS IT) Come on, you stupid machine.
(CALLING, OFF) Oi! Getting violent with power-mad tin-cans? That’s my job.
Ace? (SEES HER) Ace!
FX: ACE RUNS UP. THEY ALMOST HUG
Er yeah. Soldier girl. Sally. How you doing? It’s... been a while.
What are you doing here? I mean it’s good to see you and everything, but how did you know I’d be- (BREAKS OFF, WORRIED) Oh no. You haven't.
Haven’t what?
Brought him. (GASPS, SUDDENLY HOPEFUL) Is he-?
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 20
(CUTTING HER OFF) No. No — he’s still Hector.
So you have brought him along. What a stupid thing to do.
Nice of you to keep up the happy-to-see-me act all of what... seconds?
Have you any idea what’s going on?
I heard about Hilda. I’m sorry. That must’ve been hard.
Yes. Yes it was. But I did it. On my own. I’m just about to start putting my life back together. But there’s other stuff happening too. Weird stuff. And now you turn up. Where’s the Doctor?
FX: POWER DOWN, PANICKING PEOPLE
What was that?
The lights. What happened to the lights?
ten
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 21
SCENE 11: EXT. LIVERPOOL PARK, BACK OF CROWD
FX: MUSIC ON STAGE — REACHING ‘FAITHLESS’-LIKE CRESCENDO
Flippin’ heck. He is a rock star.
It shouldn’t have got this far. (TO SELF) How’s he doing it? How’s he got everyone believing his lies?
It’s a free country isn’t it? People can believe what they want.
A parade. A stage. A few bands. A free festival. That’s not what he’s about. If you listen to him. What he’s been saying. That’s not what he’s really about.
You know a lot about him?
I’ve been following him. Across the North West. Even had a few run-ins with him at some of his smaller rallies. At the start. He’s... dangerous.
Hate to break it to you Reverend Janet, but maybe the kids just aren’t into hymns and prayers any more. They’d rather rave all night with this guy than get up on a Sunday and go to church.
No. It’s more than that.
You can’t blame this fella for poaching your congregations.
It’s not just the church that’s in danger. That’s the least of it. It’s everyone.
You what?
Come on. He’s coming back on stage. I want to get closer.
FX: MUSIC ENDS, CROWD CHEERS
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 22
SCENE 12: EXT. LIVERPOOL PARK, FRONT OF CROWD
FX: THUNDER. RUFUS’ WORDS DELIVERED ON STAGE OVER PA
Dunno about you lot, but I.. am. buzzin’!
FX: CROWD GOES WILD
Can you feel the energy? We got it all right here. See that?. Lights are going out all over town. There goes the Town Hall. The station. The McCartney Museum.
FX: CROWD ‘OOHS’ AND ‘AAHS’

It’s another sign. A sign we’ve had our fun. And now the work begins. Don’t be afraid. If you’re here, that’s a start. It means you can listen to what I’ve got to say. And that might just save your life.
Now, who wants to be saved?
FX: CHEERS FROM CROWD
I said, who wants to be saved?
FX: BIGGER CHEER
Because you will need saving. And it’1ll be a choice. (BEAT) You all had a proper mad one today?
FX: BIG CHEER

Nice one. Sorted. ‘Cos, listen. Here’s the serious bit. The end isn’t just nigh. It’s now. Tonight. You’ve seen the signs across the world. Natural disasters. Disease. Wars. Starvation. But the North is the chosen land. Liverpool the chosen site of the final great battle. Power’s down everywhere. Everywhere but here. Everything’s stopped. Buses. Trains. No-one in or out.
FX: CROWD FALLS QUIET
You all know about the dreams? Well, some of you have seen this coming.
FX: A FEW CHEERS
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 23
Some of you will know what happens next. To you. You might even have seen... how you die. Don’t be afraid. It’s all part of the plan.
FX: UNSURE MURMURS SPREAD
(CALLING FROM CROWD) Con-man! Fraud!
What’s that?
(CALLING) This is all fake!
Down there. Put the spotlight on him. Give him a mike. (TO DOCTOR) You’re not here to be saved, fella? You don’t believe?
I don’t believe there’s anything these people need to be saved from. (GETS MIC) Except perhaps, you. (BEAT) Anyone can predict an apocalypse. I should know. I’ve seen a few.
Go on. I’m open to all points of view. But the signs are all there. The horsemen are riding. You can’t deny that, fella.
(VIA MIC) I’m just saying. You can choose any time in human history. You’ll always find war. You’1l always find plague. You’1l always find famine.
If you’re ticking boxes for the end of the world, the four horsemen are on permanent rotation.
FX: CROWD MURMURS
I see there’s some think you’ve got a point. Come on. Up on
stage. Join me... mister...?
(VIA MIC) Doctor. I’m on my way.
Give him a hand, then. Let’s hear it for.. the Doctor!
FX: CROWD APPLAUSE
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 24
SCENE 13: INT. TRAIN STATION
FX: B/G PEOPLE LEAVING, SALLY AND ACE EDGING THROUGH DARK
This way. I think the steps were back here.

There’s a lot of strange stuff been happening. I was going to try and hook up with the Department again. One of those taskforces, anyone. I’d filled in forms. Confirmed my ID. Going down to London for interviews.
Strange stuff? What strange stuff?
Lights in the sky. Weird weather. Bad dreams. The trains all stopped running just now.
You think the world’s ending ‘cos British Rail’s kaput?
What happened to the power, then?
(UNSURE) Coincidence?
That’s what I thought about the dreams. But everyone’s been getting the same thing... Premonitions.. Flashes of visions... Aaaaarrgh! (CRIES IN PAIN, SINKS TO FLOOR)
Sally?
(PANTING) I... I just thought about it.. and I’m there... I’m in there now... My nightmare. My future... it’s in dreams...
Morgan? What are you on about? You’re not dreaming. You’re awake.
(DELIRIOUS) Where am I? The walls are white... (CRIES OUT IN PAIN) Ace...? Are you there? I can’t see you.
I’m here, Barbie. Here. Take my hand.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 25
(GASPING) Always the same... (CRIES OUT) Pain... in my.. (SCREAMS IN
Sally!
FX: RUMBLING EARTHQUAKE, BUILDING FIXTURES SHAKING
(TO SELF) What now? Earthquake?
SCREAMS AGAIN

HECTOR: You can’t blame this fella for poaching your congregations.
JANET: It’s not just the church that’s in danger. That’s the least of it. It’s everyone.
HECTOR: You what?
JANET: Come on. He’s coming back on stage. I want to get closer.
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 22
DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 12: EXT. LIVERPOOL PARK, FRONT OF CROWD
RUFUS: Dunno about you lot, but I.. am. buzzin’!
RUFUS: Can you feel the energy? We got it all right here. See that?. Lights are going out all over town. There goes the Town Hall. The station. The McCartney Museum.
RUFUS: It’s another sign. A sign we’ve had our fun. And now the work begins. Don’t be afraid. If you’re here, that’s a start. It means you can listen to what I’ve got to say. And that might just save your life.
RUFUS: Now, who wants to be saved?
RUFUS: I said, who wants to be saved?
RUFUS: Because you will need saving. And it’1ll be a choice. (BEAT) You all had a proper mad one today?
RUFUS: Nice one. Sorted. ‘Cos, listen. Here’s the serious bit. The end isn’t just nigh. It’s now. Tonight. You’ve seen the signs across the world. Natural disasters. Disease. Wars. Starvation. But the North is the chosen land. Liverpool the chosen site of the final great battle. Power’s down everywhere. Everywhere but here. Everything’s stopped. Buses. Trains. No-one in or out.
RUFUS: You all know about the dreams? Well, some of you have seen this coming.
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 23
DOCTOR WHO: Some of you will know what happens next. To you. You might even have seen... how you die. Don’t be afraid. It’s all part of the plan.
DOCTOR: (CALLING FROM CROWD) Con-man! Fraud!
RUFUS: What’s that?
DOCTOR: (CALLING) This is all fake!
RUFUS: Down there. Put the spotlight on him. Give him a mike. (TO DOCTOR) You’re not here to be saved, fella? You don’t believe?
DOCTOR: I don’t believe there’s anything these people need to be saved from. (GETS MIC) Except perhaps, you. (BEAT) Anyone can predict an apocalypse. I should know. I’ve seen a few.
RUFUS: Go on. I’m open to all points of view. But the signs are all there. The horsemen are riding. You can’t deny that, fella.
DOCTOR: (VIA MIC) I’m just saying. You can choose any time in human history. You’ll always find war. You’1l always find plague. You’1l always find famine.
DOCTOR: If you’re ticking boxes for the end of the world, the four horsemen are on permanent rotation.
RUFUS: I see there’s some think you’ve got a point. Come on. Up on
RUFUS: stage. Join me... mister...?
DOCTOR: (VIA MIC) Doctor. I’m on my way.
RUFUS: Give him a hand, then. Let’s hear it for.. the Doctor!
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 24
DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 13: INT. TRAIN STATION
ACE: This way. I think the steps were back here.
SALLY: There’s a lot of strange stuff been happening. I was going to try and hook up with the Department again. One of those taskforces, anyone. I’d filled in forms. Confirmed my ID. Going down to London for interviews.
ACE: Strange stuff? What strange stuff?
SALLY: Lights in the sky. Weird weather. Bad dreams. The trains all stopped running just now.
ACE: You think the world’s ending ‘cos British Rail’s kaput?
SALLY: What happened to the power, then?
ACE: (UNSURE) Coincidence?
SALLY: That’s what I thought about the dreams. But everyone’s been getting the same thing... Premonitions.. Flashes of visions... Aaaaarrgh! (CRIES IN PAIN, SINKS TO FLOOR)
ACE: Sally?
SALLY: (PANTING) I... I just thought about it.. and I’m there... I’m in there now... My nightmare. My future... it’s in dreams...
ACE: Morgan? What are you on about? You’re not dreaming. You’re awake.
SALLY: (DELIRIOUS) Where am I? The walls are white... (CRIES OUT IN PAIN) Ace...? Are you there? I can’t see you.
ACE: I’m here, Barbie. Here. Take my hand.
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 25
SALLY: (GASPING) Always the same... (CRIES OUT) Pain... in my.. (SCREAMS IN
AGONY: )
ACE: Sally!
ACE: (TO SELF) What now? Earthquake?
ACE: Hold on, Morgan! Hold on!
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 26
DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 14: EXT. LIVERPOOL PARK, BACK OF CROWD
HECTOR: What’s he up to now? The Doctor?
JANET: You know that fella? He’s challenging Mr Stone. Could have done with a few more people doing that early on. Maybe things wouldn’t have got so far out of hand.
HECTOR: He’s up on stage with him.
JANET: What’s he going to do? Sing a song?
HECTOR: We'd be getting off lightly. Just pray he didn’t bring his spoons.
RUFUS: (DISTANT, VIA P.A.) Very well, Mr Doctor. Now you’re here. What is it you want to say?
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 27
DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 15: EXT. LIVERPOOL PARK, ON STAGE (CONTINUOUS)
DOCTOR: I think everyone should go home.
RUFUS: Don’t tell me, you’re just a party-pooper? The kids being too noisy for you?
DOCTOR: Crowds create a psychic energy. A potent force. I don’t know why, but this man is manipulating you for his own purposes.
RUFUS: Who’s spouting the mumbo-jumbo now, Mr Doctor? (CHUCKLES) What do you say you lot, shall I let him carry on?
RUFUS: Ooh. Tough crowd.
DOCTOR: Sometimes people don’t know they need help. Don’t realise the danger they’re already in.
RUFUS: Don’t take it to heart, Mr Doctor. We’re agreed on something then. Something’s coming. No-one ever believes a prophet in his own land. That’s why I left Macclesfield. Well, not the only reason.
DOCTOR: If the world were about to end, I’d know. But for some reason, you need people to think it’s true.
RUFUS: Come on then. What am I supposed to be doing here?
DOCTOR: I don’t know. Not yet.
RUFUS: You don’t know. But I do. And that’s why everyone’s been here today. Why they’ve gathered. This is just the beginning. I’ve a whole load of miracles to show off before we reach the end of the end of days. So, we might as well ‘ave a large one!
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 28
DOCTOR: (SOTTO) Humans... I don’t know why I bother...
RUFUS: Aw... don’t go, Mr Doctor. Don’t go. You see I can give even the non-believers something no religion’s ever offered before.
RUFUS: I can give you... proof.
DOCTOR: Proof? You’re going to make the sky crack open? Bring down the
DOCTOR: portents of the end of the world?
RUFUS: (BEAT) Something like that, yeah.
RUFUS: (FX: SNAPS FINGERS. CRACK OF THUNDER. SOUND OF HUMMING ENERGY BEAM. CROWD GASPS IN WONDER)
RUFUS: (OVER NOISE) The lights from above surround you. They bathe you. They have chosen you.
DOCTOR: (STRUGGLING, HELD BY ENERGY BEAM) What... are... you?
RUFUS: Do you believe me now, Mr Doctor?
RUFUS: The angels are here. Look up. Everyone. Look at the sky!
RUFUS: They’re coming!
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 29
DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 16: LIVERPOOL PARK, BACK OF CROWD (CONTINUOUS)
DOCTOR WHO: (FX: HUMMING ENERGY BEAM AND AQUILIAN JETS DESCENDING, OFF.
CROWD: GASPING AND CHEERING, CLOSER)
HECTOR: Oh no.. (TRIES TO PUSH THROUGH CROWD) Let me past... That’s my friend up there!
JANET: Hector, wait. You’1ll never get through! What are they doing to
JANET: him?
HECTOR: (CALLING BACK) They’re killing him!
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 30
DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 17: LIVERPOOL PARK, FRONT OF CROWD (CONTINUOUS)
DOCTOR: (STRUGGLING) Let... me... go!
RUFUS: (OVER NOISE) Mine isn’t the will that decides what happens here. It’s up to the angels themselves. And they’ve come down to make their judgement on you, Doctor.
PRASKA: (MULTIPLE VOICES OVERLAPPING) Doctor. Doctor. Unbeliever. Infidel.
RUFUS: (OVER NOISE) You can’t deny it now when they’re all around you. Glorious, golden, and here to save the believers!
DOCTOR: (STRUGGLING) This man is not a prophet! These are not angels! Believe me! For your own sakes, you must believe me!(CRIES OUT)
PRASKA: (MULTIPLE VOICES OVERLAPPING) Doctor. Doctor. Unbeliever. Infidel.
PRASKA: END OF PART ONE
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 31

elements.text: PART TWO
SCENE 18: LIVERPOOL PARK, BACK OF CROWD [REPRISE OF SCENES
16 & 17, HEARD FROM BACK OF CROWD]
What are they doing to him?
They’re killing him!
(STRUGGLING, DISTANT) Let... me... go!
(VIA P.A.) Mine isn’t the will that decides what happens here. It’s up to the angels themselves. And they’ve come down to make their judgement on you, Doctor.
(DISTANT, MULTIPLE VOICES OVERLAPPING) Doctor. Doctor. Unbeliever. Infidel.
(VIA P.A.) You can’t deny it now when they’re all around you. Glorious, golden, and here to save the believers!
(DISTANT, STRUGGLING) This man is not a prophet! These are not angels! Believe me! For your own sakes, you must believe me!(CRIES OUT)
(DISTANT, MULTIPLE VOICES OVERLAPPING) Doctor. Doctor. Unbeliever. Infidel.
FX: FOOM OF LIGHT EXPLOSION
FX: CROWD GOES WILD CHEERING
What happened?
They... vapourised him. I’m sorry... That man was definitely your friend?
I’ve gotta get through. I’ve gotta get up there. I’ve gotta
know for sure...
FX: HECTOR PUSHES THROUGH CROWD, JANET FOLLOWING
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 32
Wait, Hector. Wait for me!
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 33
SCENE 19: INT. AQUILIAN SHIP
FX: EXPLOSION REVERSES AS DOCTOR TELEPORTS ABOARD
Welcome, Time Lord. Welcome.
(DAZED) Ah. Is this the Hotel California?
This is the Aquilian Flagship ‘Devotion’. You are welcome here.
And you are...?

Empress Praska of the Third Holy Aquilian Empire. Daughter of Veska the Magnificent (may his plumage never fade). You have passed through our matter transportation beam, so you may be a little disorientated. Would you care for some tea?
Eagles... You look like eagles... in golden armour.
I understand that some species have made this comparison.
And when it suits you, you can look like angels. Or gods?
When it suits. Precisely. And for the moment, it suits our purpose for you to remain here. To allow our agent to do his work.
Your.. agent? Rufus Stone. He’s doing your bidding.
He answered our call. He has been an ideal representative on Earth, but we thought it time we enhanced his... theatre. Your presence threatens our design.
Your ‘design’? Tell me, precisely what designs do you have on the people down there.
FX: PRASKA OPERATES CONTROLS, A VIEWING SHUTTER OPENS BELOW
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 34
Look. You can see the city set out below. This Liver-pool. But you are mistaken. The people are not our purpose.
The eclipse. The thunder and lightning. You’re projecting a solar shield. Assisting that conjuring show down there. Keeping everyone in the dark. In more ways than one.
The mortals know so little of their part in our destiny.
They are not tools to be used, these humans. (BEAT) And yes. I'd love some tea.
Of course. You are our guest. Do not fear. We shall not sully our hands with these ephemeral beings. We Aquilians are destined for godhood, after all.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 35
SCENE 20: EXT. LIVERPOOL PARK
FX: CROWD CHEERS DIE DOWN
(ON STAGE, VIA PA) Nice one. You’ve seen angels. Now get ready for devils. There’s a fight coming. And if you’re not up for it, go home.
I mean it. That’s it. Show’s over. You know from your own dreams who’s fighting, and who’s hiding under their beds when the Earth starts shaking.
(FX: GROUND TREMORS ON CUE. SOME PANICKED CRIES. MOVE TO BACK OF CROWD WHERE HECTOR AND JANET ARE WALKING)
(VIA PA) For the rest of you. Those who are willing to fight. Those who believe in me. Well, you can make a difference. You see, it’s not just the end of this world that’s coming. It’s
the start of a new one too.
(PUSHING THROUGH) It was bound to happen one day. The Doctor walks into danger. Him and Ace. All the time, like it’s some sort of game. Well he’s been caught out this time.
(CATCHING HIM UP) What are you talking about?
FX: GROUND TREMOR. DISTANT CRIES. THEY STOP
Is he making these earthquakes?
How can he? I can’t believe Rufus Stone is able to-
(VIA PA) Do you feel it? The music’s well and truly over. The last dance is done. No more encores. Now it’s getting serious. Let those who want to leave. Do it safely. Do it calmly.
FX: MOVEMENT OF CROWD
You’d think they’d be running for their lives... But they’re just walking... Doing as they’re told.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 36
Only some. Everyone else is sticking around. They really do anything he tells them. They’re all so calm. What are these dreams he’s talking about?
(VIA PA) Although... I can sense there are those... those who may be new in town. Those who are lost. Unsure. Liverpool’s long lost sons.
Eh?
(VIA PA) A name. I’m getting a name... Thomas? Hector Thomas? You’ve had no dreams, bro, but your place is with us.
How... how does he know?
(VIA PA) You know if it’s over for you. If you can go home. Be with your families. But for the rest... There’s one more march. To the Pier Head. To the Mersey. Let’s crack on!
FX: CROWD CHEERS
Hector... Hector... you’re not going with them?
He knew my name. He knows what’s going on. He knows who I am. Things are getting weirder and weirder. And if the Doctor’s gone... I’ve gotta catch up with him.
RUNS OFF
(CALLING) Hector! Don’t go!
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 37
SCENE 21: INT. AQUILIAN SHIP
FX: TEACUP REPLACED ON SAUCER
Assam. I'd say... nineteen-twenty vintage. Where did you get it?
We have been here a long, long time, Doctor. We’ve seen you, flitting by. In and out of their lives. With your many faces.
So you know what I can do.
You are a protector. Like us. We extend our protection to the whole of this region.
Do you? Your benevolence has boundaries, then?
Some incursions have been inevitable. We do not control all planes of being. Our power is not limitless. Not yet.

But as far as we are able, using the means granted to us by the Emperor Veska (may his flight through eternity be without end) — we shield this sacred land from direct assault. Many have tried. But we deflect their ships, their weapons, their agents, further to the south. There they can be dealt with by others. Others such as yourself, Doctor.
I see. You guard this part of the Earth. Of England. Jealously. And I bet you pop down every so often to shake a feather. Stick your beaks in.
When it has been necessary, yes. Always for good. Always for protection.
You're in their legends. Liver Birds. Defending the city of Liverpool.
Not just this city. Across this region lies the power we protect. Buried deep within and beneath. Between the dimensions of down and around. (To’Koth be praised).
Now you’re talking in riddles.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 38
We are saving these humans. Preparing them for their greatest battle.
How very considerate of you. And who is this battle against?
The Hirudines are coming. And they will feed. I must attend to our preparations. You will remain here. Securely.
FX: PRASKA GOES TO DOOR AND OPENS IT

Hirudines. Inter-dimensional leeches sucking up psychic energy bleeding between realities. If they ever existed at all, they’re a legend of the old universes. Extinct. They’ve no place here. (BEAT) Why now?
Because now is the end of days. Because all things draw to
their conclusion. (BEAT) Because To’koth is dying.
FX: DOOR CLOSES AND LOCKS
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 39
SCENE 22: INT. TRAIN STATION
(FX: RUMBLING, STOPS, A FEW PEOPLE WHIMPERING, SCRAMBLING TO
It’s stopped. Whatever it was. It’s stopped. Sally... you all right?
(WAKING) What... what happened?
You passed out, and then we had an earthquake. The steps to the platform collapsed. But I think everyone made it out.
I don’t pass out. (GETTING UP) We should go too. Assess the damage.
Hang on. You did a pretty good impression of being unconscious. Not to mention all the screaming before. What’s wrong with you?
(FX: PICKING UP HER STUFF) Nothing. It’s just a dream. It’s not real. Never had it while I was awake before.
What was it then? Hallucination? You never struck me as the hysterical type.
It’s not just me. It’s everyone round here. They’re saying people are seeing their own futures. Some of them are seeing how they die.
You what?
Time disturbance. Dimensional fractures. And now you’re here.
Good job too from the sound of it. We’1ll find the Doctor and get him up to speed.

You think this a coincidence? You turn up with the boy who shouldn’t exist. Someone those Elder Gods moved heaven and Earth to destroy. (TUTTING) And you think it’s coincidence when all hell breaks loose?
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 40
Hang on. You don’t think this is our fault?
Your fault. This is your fault.
You what?
The Doctor didn’t want to take him. Hector’s.. wrong. You shouldn’t have done it Ace.
What should we have done then? Let him die? Let that fire demon take his soul back to... wherever?
I’m not saying it would have been any easier...
Too right. If there’s the slightest hope of seeing Hex again. That we can jog his memory. Somehow bring him back-
(ANGRY, OVER HER) He was already dead, Ace. (QUIETER) He was already dead.
Yeah. Give up. Some soldier you turned out to be.
Don’t you dare judge me...
I tried. At least I tried to do.. something.
It’s not a competition, Ace. Why does everything have to be a contest with you?
Because it is. Life’s a contest. You’ve got to win. Every time.
(FINALLY SNAPPING) Right, well, look at me. I made it home. I’m living my life. I won. I’m best at life. You got that? Now get out of my way.
FX: ACE GRABS HER
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 41
No way, Barbie. No way are you getting away with that—
PUNCHED
Get off. Oh, you’ve so had this coming... (LAUNCHES HERSELF AT ACE)
Yeah? Come on then!
FX: THEY FIGHT
Oi! You two, stop it! What on Earth do you think you’re doing!
FX: JANET PULLS THEM APART
Janet... I...
(ANGRY) Get that torch out of my face.. (BEAT, CONTRITE) Er, vicar.
The world’s ending out there and you two decide to knock lumps off each other. (BEAT) Follow me.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 42
SCENE 23: EXT. LIVERPOOL STREET
(FX: RUMBLING OUTSIDE, CROWD WALKING ALONG. HECTOR RUNNING
CROWD TO RUFUS. EARTHQUAKE AND LIGHTNING. )
(CALLING) Stick with me. This is the safe path. You wanna be soldiers, you gotta learn to march.
(RUNNING, CALLING) Rufus! Mr Stone! I’m Hector. Hector Thomas.
All right. Let him through. This is the one I’ve been waiting for.
How did you know my name?
You’ve a destiny, bro. You’re a leader.
Am I? I’m usually a follower.
Not this time. We’re going to the Pier Head, but I got to attend to some business. I need a man with a good story to keep the crowd onside.
Me? You want me to talk to these people?
Walk beside me, our kid. I’1l tell you all about the good fight.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 43
SCENE 24: EXT. STREET
(FX: RUMBLING AND THUNDER, CROWDS PASSING THROUGH STREETS, MURMURING, NOT PANICKING. )
What’s going on?
Four o’clock and pitch black. What happened to the sun?
Rufus Stone switched it off.
Has he some kind of psychic control? Rioting in the streets? Is that what it is?
Yeah. That must be why we started fighting-
No. Nothing like that. If anything, it’s been deadly calm. Any problems you two have are all your own.
So, the sun disappears, the ground splits open and everyone politely walks away?
Pretty much, yeah. Telly’s off. Radio too. Most people went home to wait and see. The rest are along with him, heading for the river.
You're right. I can see a line of people. Looks like a march. Along the faultlines.
All the way from here to.. the Pier Head — that’s where he was going next.
FX: HELICOPTER IN DISTANCE
What are those lights?
More angels, maybe...
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 44
Angels?
No. That’s something human. A helicopter. An army helicopter. It’s circling... away from the pier. Heading north over the docks. Come on!
FX: HELICOPTER APPROACHES
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 45
SCENE 25: INT. AQUILIAN SHIP
FX: BANGS ON DOOR
(CALLING) Hello? Who is To’Koth? Aren’t you going to tell me any more?
WAITS, NO REPLY
(TO SELF) Can’t expect every alien race to reveal its entire plot on the first meeting, I suppose...
Quite the most hospitable captors I’ve had in a while. Brew a very good cup of tea. (FX: TAKES ANOTHER SIP) Now. What have we
here?
(FX: FOUR SHORT SONIC SCREWDRIVER BURSTS. HE KICKS A PANEL LOOSE, IT FALLS)
Ah. Gubbins. I like gubbins.
FX: CROUCHES AND POKES AROUND WIRING, SEVERAL SONIC BURSTS
There! (GETS UP, PACES) An efficient ship like this has a very sensitive environmental control system.
So if I happen to have re-routed the fire-alarm sensor to the engine monitors, then spilling something hot... like this tea...
FX: TIPS CUP OVER SENSOR. ALARMS START
Well, that could convince the mainframe that the ship’s thrusters are exploding.
FX: SEVERAL CLUNKING VENTS OPEN OUTSIDE SHIP
And so begin an emergency fuel vent.
FX: DISTANT HISSING OF EXPELLED FUEL OUTSIDE
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 46
And if I’ve also re-routed the signal from the pressure sensov... here. (FX: SMASHES CUP ON SENSOR)
That might tell the ship its hull’s going to rupture due to unstable atmospheric forces.
(WALKS ACROSS ROOM) Pressure vents located here, here and here. So I should stand... here, I think.
FX: SEVERAL FLOOR HATCHES OPEN, RUSHING WINDS OUTSIDE

The warm air currents created by the engine venting will cause an updraft. I simply need to impede my mass-velocity by spreading it across a larger surface area. And drift safely down to Earth. In theory.
FX: DOOR OPENS, LOTS OF ALARMS GOING OFF OUTSIDE
Doctor!
FX: UNFURLS BROLLY
In other words. Always carry an umbrella.
FX: DROPS THROUGH HATCH
(FALLING INTO DISTANCE) Goodbye Praska. Excellent tea!
No!
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 47
SCENE 26: EXT. DOCKSIDE
(FX: HELICOPTER OVERHEAD, THEN DESCENDING TO AIRCRAFT CARRIER, OFF)
Who are they? I don’t recognise the logo. Three-B, A and 6G...? Hang about, what’s the army doing with a logo?
Don’t take much interest in current affairs do you? They were privatised years ago.
Individual units can seek authorisation to carry out commercial security work. Helps pay for the boots.
It’s coming down, but I don’t see where there’d be anywhere in the city it could [land].
(INTERRUPTING) It’s not coming down in the city. Look at the lights out there. There’s an aircraft carrier sitting in the Mersey! (FX: RUNS TO DOCKSIDE)
Wicked. Although... can’t say I’m too keen on paying a visit to Soldiers R Us. I’d rather go and find Hector. And the Doctor.
You can do what you want, Ace. I’m going aboard.
FX: SHE RUNS AND DIVES IN
Knows her own mind, Miss Morgan.
That’s the army for you. Can’t wait to be given orders.
You know. I heard you and Sally back at the train station. Arguing about a young man. Was that this ‘Hector’ of yours?
Yeah? So?
Unusual name. Think I bumped into him not so long ago.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 48
You know where he is?
I’ve an idea. You think Sally will be all right?

She’s with her own sort now. Loves all that ‘yes sir, no sir’ stuff does Sergeant Barbie. Besides, it’s not like we won’t be able to find her again. With that bloomin’ great thing sitting in the river.
Come on then. Let’s find Hector!
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 49
SCENE 27: EXT. STREET
FX: DOCTOR FALLING THROUGH WINDS
(STRUGGLING) Left a bit.. right a bit.. How does one steer an umbrella?
Need somewhere central.. St John’s Gardens would be nice... Whoah!
FX: BLOWN OFF COURSE, CRIES OUT FALLING THROUGH AIR
(FX: DOCTOR THUMPS ONTO THE GROUND, GETS UP, FURLS UMBRELLA.
STREET SIGN)
(TO SELF) Hmm. Vauxhall Road. Drifted off-course in those clouds. Or rather that Aquilian solar-shield. Now where did I put the TARDIS...?
FX: RUMBLING EARTHQUAKE
The situation appears to have deteriorated. Considerably. Where
is everyone, I wonder?
FX: HURRIES OFF
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 50
SCENE 28: INT. CARRIER, BRIDGE
FX: MARCHES ON DECK
Sir. Private Sally Morgan of the King’s New Delta. Department C-19 security clearance five sigma five zero gamma four.
(SHUSHING HER) We don’t want to give away all the secret security codes.
No sir. Sorry sir. Reporting for duty sir.

Welcome aboard commando-carrier HMS Heaney. Captain Patrick Gormley. Third Belfast Air-Sea Taskforce. Incorporated. They found you a dry uniform, I see. Impressive swim in choppy waters, there, Private.
Just keen to do my bit sir. If I can. I don’t know if you-
You can stop right there, Morgan. We ran a DNA test on your profile. You got a special flag off the central personnel database. Quite the expert in the weird and uncanny are you not?
Yes sir. That’s why I came sir. Thought you might want the help.

You thought correctly. A strange commission this one. Good to have someone like you along. Glad you’re volunteering. Saves us waiting for the UNIT bods to get back to us. Never like coming north of Watford Gap, anyway.
Come below, soldier. We’ve something you might want to see.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 51
SCENE 29: EXT. STREET OUTSIDE CHURCH
(WALKING) The march went that way. To the Pier Head. If we hurry, we’ll catch them.
(WALKING) What was all this about? This bloke’s throwing a party, ‘cos they think it’s the end of the world?
That’s pretty much it. Same man has everyone believing they can see the future. (STOPS) Hold on. There’s someone up there. In the church tower.
(STOPPING) Not the best place to stand now Liverpool’s an earthquake zone.

DOCTOR: There! (GETS UP, PACES) An efficient ship like this has a very sensitive environmental control system.
DOCTOR: So if I happen to have re-routed the fire-alarm sensor to the engine monitors, then spilling something hot... like this tea...
DOCTOR: Well, that could convince the mainframe that the ship’s thrusters are exploding.
DOCTOR: And so begin an emergency fuel vent.
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 46
DOCTOR: And if I’ve also re-routed the signal from the pressure sensov... here. (FX: SMASHES CUP ON SENSOR)
DOCTOR: That might tell the ship its hull’s going to rupture due to unstable atmospheric forces.
DOCTOR: (WALKS ACROSS ROOM) Pressure vents located here, here and here. So I should stand... here, I think.
DOCTOR: The warm air currents created by the engine venting will cause an updraft. I simply need to impede my mass-velocity by spreading it across a larger surface area. And drift safely down to Earth. In theory.
PRASKA: Doctor!
DOCTOR: In other words. Always carry an umbrella.
DOCTOR: (FALLING INTO DISTANCE) Goodbye Praska. Excellent tea!
PRASKA: No!
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 47
DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 26: EXT. DOCKSIDE
DOCTOR WHO: (FX: HELICOPTER OVERHEAD, THEN DESCENDING TO AIRCRAFT CARRIER, OFF)
ACE: Who are they? I don’t recognise the logo. Three-B, A and 6G...? Hang about, what’s the army doing with a logo?
JANET: Don’t take much interest in current affairs do you? They were privatised years ago.
SALLY: Individual units can seek authorisation to carry out commercial security work. Helps pay for the boots.
JANET: It’s coming down, but I don’t see where there’d be anywhere in the city it could [land].
SALLY: (INTERRUPTING) It’s not coming down in the city. Look at the lights out there. There’s an aircraft carrier sitting in the Mersey! (FX: RUNS TO DOCKSIDE)
ACE: Wicked. Although... can’t say I’m too keen on paying a visit to Soldiers R Us. I’d rather go and find Hector. And the Doctor.
SALLY: You can do what you want, Ace. I’m going aboard.
JANET: Knows her own mind, Miss Morgan.
ACE: That’s the army for you. Can’t wait to be given orders.
JANET: You know. I heard you and Sally back at the train station. Arguing about a young man. Was that this ‘Hector’ of yours?
ACE: Yeah? So?
JANET: Unusual name. Think I bumped into him not so long ago.
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 48
ACE: You know where he is?
JANET: I’ve an idea. You think Sally will be all right?
ACE: She’s with her own sort now. Loves all that ‘yes sir, no sir’ stuff does Sergeant Barbie. Besides, it’s not like we won’t be able to find her again. With that bloomin’ great thing sitting in the river.
JANET: Come on then. Let’s find Hector!

DOCTOR: (STRUGGLING) Left a bit.. right a bit.. How does one steer an umbrella?

DOCTOR: (FX: DOCTOR THUMPS ONTO THE GROUND, GETS UP, FURLS UMBRELLA.
TAPS: STREET SIGN)
DOCTOR: (TO SELF) Hmm. Vauxhall Road. Drifted off-course in those clouds. Or rather that Aquilian solar-shield. Now where did I put the TARDIS...?

DOCTOR: is everyone, I wonder?

DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 28: INT. CARRIER, BRIDGE
SALLY: Sir. Private Sally Morgan of the King’s New Delta. Department C-19 security clearance five sigma five zero gamma four.
GORMLEY: (SHUSHING HER) We don’t want to give away all the secret security codes.
SALLY: No sir. Sorry sir. Reporting for duty sir.
GORMLEY: Welcome aboard commando-carrier HMS Heaney. Captain Patrick Gormley. Third Belfast Air-Sea Taskforce. Incorporated. They found you a dry uniform, I see. Impressive swim in choppy waters, there, Private.
SALLY: Just keen to do my bit sir. If I can. I don’t know if you-
GORMLEY: You can stop right there, Morgan. We ran a DNA test on your profile. You got a special flag off the central personnel database. Quite the expert in the weird and uncanny are you not?
SALLY: Yes sir. That’s why I came sir. Thought you might want the help.
GORMLEY: You thought correctly. A strange commission this one. Good to have someone like you along. Glad you’re volunteering. Saves us waiting for the UNIT bods to get back to us. Never like coming north of Watford Gap, anyway.
GORMLEY: Come below, soldier. We’ve something you might want to see.
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 51

JANET: That’s pretty much it. Same man has everyone believing they can see the future. (STOPS) Hold on. There’s someone up there. In the church tower.
ACE: (STOPPING) Not the best place to stand now Liverpool’s an earthquake zone.

DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 30: INT. CARRIER, STORAGE
GORMLEY: You can see why we need an expert. Thought it was just some carved lump of rock. Museum piece. Till it started glowing.

GORMLEY: Fella called Rufus Stone brought it over to Belfast a few months back.
SALLY: You’re working for Rufus Stone? Do you take on commissions from anyone who asks?
GORMLEY: We’ve run high security transports before. Archaeological finds. Treasure troves. This was a bit different. Mr Stone was offering a lot of money. His deposit could pay for this ship. With double the amount promised on delivery. Besides, we can always do with the training.
SALLY: So Rufus Stone turned up on your doorstep with this rock and told you to deliver it here. You do know who he is? What he’s saying?
GORMLEY: We do now. Gave us this map reference and this time and date. So we're here on cue. He’s expecting an attack. He might just be a loony-tune like everyone says, but we’ve got his deposit. No harm done. Until these symbols lit up gold.
SALLY: The markings. I’ve seen them before. Do they look like eagles to you?

GORMLEY: You've seen these carvings somewhere else?
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 53
SALLY: That chopper of yours. Fancy flying us back to shore?
GORMLEY: Too tricky landing with all the crowds. But we’ve some pretty nifty speedboats.

DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 31: INT. CHURCH
JANET: (CALLING) Rufus? Rufus Stone? I know it’s you.

DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 55
DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 32: EXT. STREET
DOCTOR: I’m sure I parked along here... Streetlights would help. And there’s something else, something throwing off my homing senses...
PRASKA: (FX: TELEPATHIC FX) You may have escaped us physically, Doctor. But I have had time enough to track your psychic spore. It is potent.

PRASKA: (D) You misconstrue our intentions. The mortals here are meaningless to us.

DOCTOR: That’s worse. Do you have any idea how bad an impression you’re making?

DOCTOR: I don’t know who you mean.

PRASKA: All scavengers have so far been deflected, but the Hirudines are only manifesting now. At the weakest points of dimensional cohesion. Where energies are emanating. Telepathic and temporal.
DOCTOR: Nice talking to you again Praska. But I’m hanging up.
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 56
PRASKA: (D) Doctor! (FADING) Doctor...
DOCTOR: Time distortion, psychoactive aliens, parasites from another dimension. This really doesn’t bode well at all. I can sense her. The TARDIS is... scared.

DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 33: INT. CHURCH TOWER
JANET: What is it you want Mr Stone? Why are you here?

DOCTOR WHO: SCENE 38: EXT. PIER HEAD, DOCKSIDE
HECTOR: (VIA PA) Hiya. Never done anything like this before. But Rufus thought I should say a few words while he’s off... talking to his angels. Seems to think I can keep you all entertained.
HECTOR: Well, me name’s Hector Thomas. I lived here a while ago. Some of you may remember. I’ve been a bad man. And a good man. But now, I’m not sure what I am any more.

HECTOR: So if Rufus Stone wants me for his champion... What do you reckon?

HECTOR: Nice to know. I’m not the man I was... and it feels good!

DOCTOR: The TARDIS. There she is!

RUFUS: Did ya miss me? Ta for waiting. And for giving our pal here your support. As you can see, the river’s not happy. The Mersey’s boiling. This is where all hell breaks loose. I’m glad so many of you‘ve stuck around to join the fight...

HECTOR: Yeah... (MORE CERTAIN) Yeah! I do. I can feel every one of you looking to me. I can do this for ya. I know I can.
RUFUS: River’s rising. Mersey Tunnel’s cracked. They’re breaking through. From the darkness, I give you — the Hirudines! The seals are broken! Come and see!
PRASKA: (FX: TELEPATHY FX) You have done well, our agent. The boy can be another beacon. Like the rock you gave to the military. He will channel the crowd’s psychic energy to those leeches. JANET: (D) He’s not their god. He’s hardly aware of their pitiful existence. He’s one of the Gods. The Elder Gods. From before this universe was a spark of singularity. He arrived so long ago. And I came with him.
