JANET: You? They send you? A paltry mortal container for psychic energy. It’1ll burn you out from the inside in seconds.
RUFUS: But I was supposed to save the world...
JANET: (D) Ha! Let me give you just a taste.
RUFUS: Aaaagh!
JANET: (D) To’koth is an Ancient One. He’s been dying beneath this Earth for millennia. His life force will be freed and this universe will have never seen the like. It will be the ultimate power in this reality.
JANET: And it will be mine.
RUFUS: END OF PART THREE
DOCTOR WHO: SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 102

elements.text: PART FOUR
SCENE 59: EXT. STREET
(FX: TELEPORTATION AND DESCENT OF AQUILIANS, METAL BOOT
Doctor? Wake, Doctor. We need you.
(COMING ROUND) Praska.. Empress Praska.. Is that you? You’re actually here... not just in my head?
Both may be said to be true. We perceived your mind overwhelmed by the divine force (almighty To’Koth be praised). We hope we provide some clarity.
Why would you do this for me?
Circumstances have become more complicated. Even we cannot foresee every outcome, and may be perplexed by the mystery of To’Koth himself (may the unknowable never be known).
(GETTING UP) Things have got a little beyond you? It must be bad if you’ve been brought down to Earth. Literally.
The protection we afford your mind is more effective at close quarters. You must aid us. Before it is too late.
Are you asking me for help?
Yes.
Then try again. With a little more humility.

We admit, our design is.. disarranged. We have lost our agent. Our servant. The means by which we would achieve our destiny. He was destroyed by a malign force. A force we underestimated. We require a psychic agent. A Time Lord will suffice.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 103
Rufus Stone is dead? (BEAT) What about my friend? What about Hector?
The boy lives. Although our view of him is... confused. (BEAT) Please. Will you help?
I’1ll consider it. On one condition. Tell me everything.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 104
SCENE 60: EXT. DOCKS
FX: HEX AND SALLY FINISH KISSING
Sal. This is all a bit sudden, eh?
Don’t you know? Don’t you know what happened to you?
Feels like I’ve gone ten rounds with a world heavyweight. It’s all a bit fuzzy. I remember... something about... chess? I wasn’t playing chess, was I?
Not you, no.
No. You’re right. It was cards. With a right couple of weirdos.
(STANDING JUST OFF) Yeah, when you two have quite finished.
Ace? That you Ace?
Here I’1ll help you up. (FX: HELPS HEX TO HIS FEET)
It’s me, all right. Put him down Barbie. My turn.
FX: ACE RUNS AND HUGS HIM
I missed you. I missed you so much, mate. It really feels like you at last.
(SQUEEZED) Whoah there. You’re crushing me!
(LETTING HIM GO) Sorry. Just... it’s good to see you.

What’s all this about eh? It’s like you haven’t seen me for years. I mean we were all just together in the TARDIS, but you two are acting like I’ve just come back from the- (BREAKS OFF) Oh. Oh no. (WOOZILY FALLS)
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 105
Catch him!
FX: HEX SLUMPS SUPPORTED BY SALLY
I think he’s starting to remember.
Oh... my [God]- I was dead. I... died. What the hell-?
While we’re on the subject. Reverend Indestructible’s on her way over.
Good. She did this. Maybe she can explain.
You didn’t see what else she did over on the Pier. I’m not so sure she’s one of the good guys.
What do you mean?
She exploded Rufus Stone.
What are you talking about? Is anyone gonna tell me what the hell’s going on?
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 106
SCENE 61: EXT. STREET
To’Koth, (glory to his blessed name), has lived in this realm for millennia. He has dwelt beneath the people of this land Since before they evolved the language to praise him.
Beneath them?
Within. Beneath. Around. He is not bound by the tiny dimensions here. He hails from the Old Time.
An Ancient One. You believe an Elder God of the old universe, an entity like Ragnarok, Fenric or Weyland — has been buried under North West England ever since humanity evolved?

Those names are known. But they are as gnats to the mighty lion of To’Koth. But the lion is dying. We heard him across the centuries and light years. We attend his hour of need. His life-force can confer infinite power on those with understanding.
That’s the problem right there. You can’t possibly have the understanding. You’ve no idea what you’re dealing with.
To’Koth will-
(INTERRUPTING) Elder Gods don’t die in this universe. Even when I’ve defeated them, they’ve always sloped off back to their own dimension.
It has never happened. It can never be allowed to happen, because it would unleash energies that have no place here. That could rip this universe apart.
Those are the powers we will harness.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 107
You? You couldn’t even face down a few leeches. What hope do you have of controlling this?
No. This explains the itch at the back of my mind ever since we arrived. Why Hector was able to defend me. I should have recognised the stench of an Elder God.
Do not blaspheme, Doctor. We ask your help to stop this other one.
Which ‘other one’?
We cannot say. We see only dimly. To’Koth knows. He wishes to commune. He has been trying to use your machine.
I see. It wants to communicate. (BEAT) Well if this To’Koth really is dying and threatening to tear this dimension apart, I don’t see I have any choice.
(FX: UNLOCKS TARDIS) Don’t be afraid, old girl. I won’t let you come to any more harm.
If you are granted an audience... then I, Empress of the Aquilians, must beg attendance-
FX: OPENS DOOR
(CUTS HER OFF) All right. I may live to regret this. But I think you’d better come in.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 108
SCENE 62: EXT. DOCKS
FX: WET FOOTSTEPS
My congregation still here? Good. Well, as you can see, reports of my death have been premature.
Wh-
(OVER HIM) There’s a lot of it about.
Who’s this?
She’s the vicar. The lady vicar. The.. er, zombie lady vicar.
It’s not her, Ace. She was my friend.

I was, wasn’t I? Have you any idea how boring it is hanging around you humans for several thousand years? This identity provides some distractions. Army chaplain. Prison visits. Touring the churches of the poor and needy all across the North. Of course I had to keep changing over the centuries. But I’ve always been able to take succour from the desperate.
I’d keep coming back too. To Merseyside. To check on him. Recharge myself. Ginny Greenteeth. Janet Green. Wicked Jenny. Peg O’Nell. I let them choose my names.
I just had to wait long enough... and he’d die. (FX: ENERGY STARTS TO FLOW INTO HER) Ah... Here it comes...
What’s she saying? Ginny Greenteeth?
Hex, you won’t understand. There’s been monsters and angels and all sorts turning up here.
People predicting the end of the world. Dreams and premonitions...
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 109
No. It was something me nan used to say, keep away from the river. Don’t go near, or Ginny Greenteeth will drag you under.

Wise words. I’ve grown strong in these waters. Watched all those humans going about their business. Slaving, trading, exploiting the workers. Been no end of suffering for me to feed on. Just to tide me over for a millennium or two. Till I could get to this...
What is that? Looks like light... energy... flowing out from the river. Into her...
Is that all you are? A parasite, no better than those leeches?
FX: WHOOSHING ENERGY INCREASES
I’m soaking it up. Bathing in the power of the Mersey. To’Koth is finally giving up the ghost... To me.

Yeah... and all the while, what’s flowing through you is flowing through me too. I know now. It’s all been jumbled in my head. But I’ve memories of where I’ve been. Who I was. Like waking from a dream.
You want to be careful remembering dreams, Hector. Ask your soldier friend.
I’m not Hector.
No. You’re something different now. I made sure that empty vessel was filled-
With Hex. I know. But it’s all mixed up in my head... Little bits of stardust left inside. I’ve been to where you came from. It’s all coming back to me. It wasn’t nice.
Hex. Maybe you’d better sit down.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 110
You were right Ace. Ginny Greenteeth’s even less than a leech. A tick. A flea, with eternal life. I saw things like her... when I was dead. Being close to the source.. I remember it all.
What?
Yeah, this Hector fella. He was a right mess. But the Doctor gave him a job to do. (FX: WALKS TOWARDS JANET)
Hex, what are you doing? You’re not strong enough. Keep away from her.
And that job was to stand in your way.

You remember the gods, boy? Remember the power they have to create realities. Imagine having that power in this world. This place teeming with life and now it’s all gonna be mine. I’m sick of being mortal.
You’re not human. But you were for a while.
Tommy. Please.
Don’t worry. I’ve got this, Sal. Look at ‘em, Ginny. My friends. Sal.. well, she’s just amazing. And Ace never gave up on me. Even when I was dead. That’s what humanity’s about. That’s true strength.
(WITH EFFORT OF CONCENTRATION) You should know. Living alongside it so long. Living in this fantastic city.
FX: STUTTERS IN ENERGY HUM
What? What are you doing? The power... It’s escaping... No!
(STRUGGLING) Not so different, me and you. The world of the ancient gods, and the world of humanity. I’ve tasted both too. And I know which I prefer.
Hex, mate! You don’t know how dangerous she is...
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 111
Come here. Everyone else has had a turn today. Give us a hug, Ginny Greenteeth. (GRABS HER)
Get off me, boy!
FX: ENERGY HUM INTERRUPTED, STUTTERING, SHORTED OUT
(STRUGGLING) That’s the trick with this self-sacrifice stuff. When you’ve done it once... next time comes easier.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 112
SCENE 63: INT. TARDIS, CONSOLE ROOM
FX: DOCTOR OPENING CHANNELS ON CONSOLE
Let’s speak to this To’Koth.. Hear its dying words.
Your craft. It is somewhat impressive. For an ephemeral being.
FX: TARDIS COMPLAINING
Don’t go overboard, Praska. You’1ll start worshipping me next. (FX: WRESTLING CONTROLS) I’m sorry old girl, this may hurt after all.
FX: ROAR OF PAIN, FROM WHICH EMERGES TO’KOTH’S VOICE
TO’ KOTH:
FX, RECOGNISABLY RUFUS STONE’S VOICE, BUT POSHER NORTHERN RP
We are here, Time Lord. To’Koth hears you.
And speaks with Rufus Stone’s voice. Or something like it.
That is but the channel. Such unknowable majesty must be reduced infinitely to enter mortal understanding. Speak to us, O To’Koth, O magnificence, O-
Do stop squawking, Praska. I’m trying to fine-tune the [signal]
TO’ KOTH: (FX, BOOMING) I am your god and you will listen to me!
Yes. Oh majesty. Never, never in my wildest raptures did I believe I could address-
TO’ KOTH: (FX) Silence!
How typical of your kind. So demanding.
TO’ KOTH: (FX) You misunderstand Doctor.
Do I?
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 113
TO’ KOTH: (FX) To’Koth is in pain. Dying. There is no time.
And your death will destroy the Earth.
TO’ KOTH: (FX) This To’Koth knows. And it saddens us.
What?
TO’ KOTH: (FX) To’Koth wants only your help, Time Lord. So we can die in peace. And leave this world unharmed. This world... that we love.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 114
SCENE 64: EXT. DOCKS
FX: HUMMING ENERGY, STUTTERING, BLOCKED
(FX: DISTORTED, STRUGGLING THROUGH) I’m doing it now. I’m taking it all. You can’t stop me. No! You can’t-
(STRUGGLING THROUGHOUT) Yeah? But I can. Feel that, Ginny Greenteeth? That’s me closing off your feeding tube.
At what cost boy? The more you hold me back, the more you’re chipping away at yourself.

I remember, coming here. Liverpool. To live with me nan. Can’t have been more than three or four. When we moved from Bolton. Back to her home town. To be nearer me dad. Not that he was around that much longer.
I’ve no idea what you think you’re doing mate... but it’s gonna kill you. Again.
(STOPPING ACE) Wait. Don’t touch him. I think... I think I know what he’s trying to do. Tommy? Can we help you?
Ace... Sal... The Doctor said I could block this energy. That Rufus could channel it away somehow. Well he’s not here. At least I can stop this one getting any more powerful... (CRIES OUT)
But I mustn’t get swept into her.. Youse two. Help me remember... Keep me grounded... Tell me who I am.
Got it! Right. Remember who you are. You’re Thomas Hector Schofield. Nurse. St Garts. London. Cybermen, remember?
Yeah! That’s it. I... remember
The Doctor! The TARDIS. Oh... I can’t think. We’ve been everywhere, we’ve done so much good. Florence Nightingale! You went gaga over her...
No! I will break him! I... will... win!
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 115
Tell me more... about me mam. Me family... Where I come from...

Your mum was Cassie Schofield. Your gran, Hilda. She brought you up when Cassie went missing. You loved her so much and she was so very proud of you. We’d stay up into the night Tommy, and she’d tell me all about you.
Coming off your scooter on the jetty. Scraping your knees when you fell off the swing. Accident-prone, she said. No wonder you became a nurse.
Sal... Keep going. I remember. We’re the same... you and me... Your granddad... My nan... We’ll get ‘em together right?
Too late for them both now. I missed gramps’ passing too. But I bet they’re up there together with a couple of stouts.
No! You cannot do this!
Not... pina coladas?
No, that’s our date. You promised. You’ve got to stick around, because you promised. You and me, remember Tom?
I... remember.
(SOTTO) Good girl, Morgan. Good girl.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 116
SCENE 65: INT. TARDIS, CONSOLE ROOM
FX: COMMUNICATIONS CRACKLING IN B/G
Love? What does an Elder God know of love? All those I’ve met exist only to hate... destroy.
Doctor! Do not speak so to the mighty To’Koth!
TO’ KOTH: To care for something more than one’s own life. That is one definition of love is it not?
So I’ve heard. But you’re about to destroy this world. This universe. How is that showing love?
TO’ KOTH: It was not our intent. We waited too long.
You came here to die. Didn’t you know-?
TO’ KOTH:

(INTERRUPTING) To’Koth was dying before we came here. We’d grown old in the Old Time, diseased, wearied by age and care. We tired of all our squabbling children. Fenric. Moloch. Mi’en Kalarash. We came and saw this world born around the Racnoss** core. It intrigued us.
You decided to stay?
TO’ KOTH: When the Earth took shape around us, we could move no longer. We were content to remain beneath these lands. And observe.
Liverpool. Lancashire. England. A land of dreamers and revolutionaries. All the artists, the visionaries... were you their inspiration, I wonder?
TO’ KOTH:

No, these mortals were To’Koth’s own fascination. Such energies, such passions, all invested in such tiny insignificant lives. It is a paradox is it not? We dreamed within the rivers and the mountains. We slept a fitful sleep, but now our time is ended. To’Koth tarried too long. And we are filled with sorrow at what will come to pass.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 117
Something is stealing your lifeforce.
TO’ KOTH: A dark parasite desires it. These scavengers come. The Aquilians have defended us-
Great Lord. We beg you-
TO’ KOTH:
But however well-intentioned, our powers are not meant for this universe. We did not realise the consequences until it was too late.
So the question remains. What can I do? To stop this reality being ripped apart by your dying breath?
TO’ KOTH: There is one place it will be safe. One place our essence can be dispersed with no ill effect.
And where is that?
TO’ KOTH: Home.
** NOTE: RECORD THIS LINE BOTH WITH AND WITHOUT WORD ‘’RACNOSS’.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 118
SCENE 66: EXT. DOCKS
FX: HUMMING ENERGY, STUTTERING
CRIES OUT IN PAIN
Keep going, Morgan! Hex. Remember everything we went through on Bliss! Remember Pelachan. Remember Evelyn! Don’t let it all be for nothing.
Ace... We’re losing him. Janet’s getting free. He’s letting her
go.
FX: HUMMING ENERGY STARTS TO FLOW AGAIN
That’s it? That is all you pitiful mortal have to give? A few memories and feeble declarations of love?
I have waited thousands of years. I can wait thousands more while this boy’s frame rots from his bones. But I sense he will be done long before that.
(PANTING) I can’t do it.. Not on me own...
FX: TARDIS MATERIALISES, DOOR OPENS
(CALLING) Allow us to assist, Thomas Hector Schofield!
No. It cannot be.
Reverend Janet Green. You are our foe. Now we have the fury of To’Koth on our side.
What are you doing in there, birdbrain? Where’s the Doctor?
Within.
I have waited so long. I will not let it go! (FX: SCREAM
OUT)
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 119
She’s being pulled, stretched into the TARDIS. How’s that possible?

The foul interloper. The infidel. You seek to steal the life of the great one. All you have taken will be ripped from you. If you hold onto it, then you will be spread across this dimension and his. And all the ones in between.
(FX: SCREAMS, STRETCHED FX) I’1l take them with me! Hector... this ‘Doctor’! Anyone who stands in my way!
(CRIES OUT) She’s got me!
Tommy! Take my hand! Here. I won’t let go. I won’t ever let you
go.
INSIDE TARDIS) (CRIES OF AGONY
That’s the Doctor! What’s happening to him in there?

His vessel. It has visited the realm of the gods. The Doctor explained. It tracks a course through this universe and all others. Everywhere it has been is connected to here and now. It can channel To’Koth’s life-force back to its point of origin.
But the Doctor’s mind and his machine are linked. He is experiencing its agony.
He can’t be alone in there. I can’t let him go through it alone.
(CALLING) Go, Ace! I’ve got Hex. You go to the Doctor. He needs you! Now!
FX: ACE RUNS INTO TARDIS
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 120
SCENE 67: INT. TARDIS, CONSOLE ROOM
FX: TARDIS GOING CRAZY, SCREAMING SYSTEMS. ACE RACES IN
(CRIES OF PAIN) Ace... Ace?
Doctor!
My mind... The TARDIS.. I don’t know if it can stand the strain...
Hold on to me Doctor. Look at me. I know what I’ve got to do. You look at me and you don’t stop. I’ve got you. I believe in you. I... love you.
FX: CACOPHONY OF TARDIS FADES INTO B/G
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 121
SCENE 68: INT. VORTEX BETWEEN REALMS (CONTINUOUS)
FX: UNNATURAL CALM, GHOSTLY HUMMING B/G. ECHOING AMBIENCE
Concentrate on me. I’m your friend.
(RECOVERING) Ace. You came to help me.
Where are we?

Somewhere between the universes of mind and matter. Both are being blasted apart. Along with the TARDIS. I agreed to let To’Koth use it as an escape route back to the Elder Gods’ dominion. The alternative was.. well, the end of the world. All worlds.
Typical you. All about the grand noble gestures. (BEAT) Hex came back.
I know. But it took the near-destruction of everything to do it. I suppose he was worth it?
You bet.
(FX: SHIMMERING OF EVENTS OUTSIDE TARDIS: HEX AND SALLY’S CRIES
What’s that?
Our reprieve is over. The barriers between dimensions are breaking down. We’re seeing shades and visions of now. Now and the future.
I can see.. Hex and Sally. She’s holding his hand. He’s out there now. Screaming in pain.
MUFFLED CRIES OF PAIN
Look again.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 122
No it’s her in pain. She’s lying down...
MUFFLED CRIES OF PAIN
He’s holding her hand.
White walls. In a room, with nurses? Hang on... This was Morgan’s dream. Her vision of the future.
A possible future.
SCREAMING IN CHILDBIRTH
She’s not dying, she’s... Oh my.. She’s having a baby! (BEAT) Professor, I am never, ever doing that.
FX: NEWBORN BABY CRIES
The vision’s fading. (CALLING) Ace we’re about to get blown apart. You’ll see many strange things. Echoes of the future. The vortex is being turned inside out by To’Koth’s lifeforce...
FX: GATHERING WINDS INCREASE
TO’ KOTH: (DISTANT, FX) Doctor... Help me...
Is that him?
He needs my assistance on the final part of his journey.
I can’t promise we’ll make it out...
Don’t worry Doctor... I trust you!
FX: DIMENSION RIPPED APART, TARDIS DOORS SLAM SHUT, ECHOING
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 123
SCENE 69: EXT. DOCKS
FX: SEAGULLS OVERHEAD
MOANING, COMING ROUND
Hex. Hex. Are you all right?
Think so, Sal. Something else got hold of Ginny Greenteeth. Dragged her away. It was.. I think it was, the TARDIS.
Yeah. The last of her got sucked in, and the doors slammed. It’s just been standing there for the last half-hour. You did good work, Nurse Schofield. Be proud to have you in my unit.
That your idea of recruitment policy? ‘Cos no way am I signing up for anything after that. (BEAT) Am I back? Am I really, really back? Cos. You know, looking up at you now. It could all be a dream.
If it is, I don’t want to wake up.
FX: GULLS CRY. MERSEY LAPS AT JETTY
It’s getting light. I can’t believe we made it to another day.
Me either. (BEAT) Hang on. Wasn’t there a seven-foot golden eagle standing there just now?
Yeah. She left. Beamed back up to her spaceship.
Right. Course she did. (BEAT) Do you think we should try and get into the TARDIS?
Let’s see if there’s anyone at home.
FX: SALLY GOES TO TARDIS, BANGS ON DOOR
No answer. What now?
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 124
I don’t know. We just wait, I guess. (BEAT. LAUGHS) I don’t believe it.
What is it?
Over there, in the Mersey, look
(FX: SPLASHING, CLINGING TO WRECKAGE, CALLING WAY OFF IN DISTANCE) Hey! Hey, you there. Could do with a hand... back to shore.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 125
SCENE 70: INT. TARDIS, CONSOLE ROOM
(FX: EARLIER EXPLOSION SUBSIDES, DISTORTED TARDIS B/G HUM
IN)
Ace?
Professor... What the... Where are we?
The TARDIS.
But... it’s white.
Needed a little spring clean. Hadn’t planned for anything quite so drastic. I should be able to restore the configuration if...
FX: MATERIALISATION OF CONSOLE, MORE NORMAL B/G
Ah, here’s her console. I suppose that’s what happens when the lifeforce of an Elder God rips through back to its home dimension.
Is that what happened? It worked?
I accompanied To’Koth on the last leg of the journey. Saw him returned to his own. They were grateful. Awestruck. You see, one of their kind has never died before.
You were there? And they let you come back?
You know what To’Koth did with his last breath? He called a truce. The Elder Gods and I have reached... not a concord exactly. An end of hostilities.
You mean, he was a goodie from the dawn of time?
Yes. First time for everything. (BEAT) The TARDIS needs to rebuild, recuperate. Now we’ve a door-switch, shall we go outside and check on the good people of Liverpool?
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 126
FX: OPERATES DOOR CONTROL. TARDIS DOORS OPEN
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 127
SCENE 71: EXT. DOCKS
FX: PEOPLE MILLING, MOVING WRECKAGE
You did good work out there, Morgan. Even though I lost my ship. And half my men.
What will you do?
You don’t run an outfit like this without pretty hefty insurance. Course I’1ll never be able to afford the premiums again. But there is Mr Stone’s deposit to consider.
Enough for another aircraft-carrier, you said.
I lost a lot of good men out there. Nothing’s gonna pay for that.
And the people in Liverpool. How are they going to explain all that?
One for your UNIT mates. Not that they care too much about what happens up north. Liverpool will recover. It always does.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 128
SCENE 72: EXT. STREET
(WALKING) I’m gonna stick around here for a bit.
(WALKING) Yeah. I kind of guessed you might.
Lot of rebuilding to do. Lot of injured people.
Stick to what you’re good at. That’s what I say.
And I want to find me nan’s grave. Say goodbye.
Course.
There’s Sal. Looks like she found the Doctor. Thick as (BEAT) I hope he’s not asking her along again.
I'll... catch you later, mate.
(CALLING AFTER) Later Ace.
thieves.
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 129
SCENE 73: EXT. ACROSS STREET (CONTINUOUS)
(WALKING) The things to come won’t be as bad as you think.
(WALKING) I can’t help remembering. That premonition. It didn’t happen this time. But one day...
The future will take care of itself. Trust me. Here comes Ace. Time to say goodbye again, Sally.
We said our goodbyes already Doctor. Last time.
We did. But it’s good to see you. It’s always good to see you. Keep flying, Private Morgan.
I will. In fact, I’1ll be flying to London. To meet the taskforce.
Give General Bambera my warmest regards. Like me, they only take the best.
(WALKING UP) We off, Doctor? Good to see you again, Morgan. There’s a soppy lad over there needs a hug.
Yeah. Nice working with you again, Ace. Although... you punch like a girl. (GOES OFF)
Oi!
We're all right, are we? Ace?
Yeah. I think so.
I’ve an idea where to visit. The TARDIS is still feeling delicate. We want to run her in gently. Give you a little glimpse of my perspective...
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 130
SCENE 74: INT. AQUILIAN SHIP

The mission continues. We begin again. The holy search. As my father great Emperor Veska (may his plumage be lit by newborn suns) always believed. If a thing has happened once in this infinite universe. It may happen again.
FX: SECURITY DOOR OPENS
You’re looking for a god. Then you need a compass.
(ENTERING) Be under no illusion Reverend Janet Green. You are our prisoner. Not our guest. (BEAT) Would you care for tea?
FX: AQUILIAN SHIP JETS ON THROUGH THE VOID
SIGNS ANND WONDERS (001) Page 131
SCENE 75: EXT. GARDEN
(FX: BIRDSONG. OLDER HEX PLAYING CATCH WITH LAUGHING DAUGHTER,
Hey, hey! No. Head the ball. Don’t catch it.
FX: TARDIS MATERIALISATION, OFF
(SERIOUS) Go inside Cassie.
FX: CASSIE RUNS OFF
(CALLING) And shut the door! Don’t wake your mam.
FX: CASSIE ENTERS HOUSE, CLOSES DOOR, OFF. RUSTLING BUSHES
